sumarize_req: Cơm Tấm Cali (CTC), a restaurant chain in Ho Chi Minh City specializing in broken rice with over 10 branches, aims to develop and deploy an online system. This system will allow customers, particularly targeting office workers, to easily order via a website. Key features include automatic order routing to the nearest branch, promotion tracking and application, online payment integration (e.g., nganluong.vn), customer feedback and rating submission, and regular price updates for security and transparency. The system should also manage all branches to facilitate data analysis for business decisions and strategies, providing a convenient, secure, and responsive online ordering experience.
